dmca.title: DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
To whom it may concern:

I am writing to file a charge that boogie4.us is in violation of U.S.
copyright laws. Our signature is on file with Google.

Search Query: "the project began as a series of sculptures by front man
[private]"

Please note that there are other queries that generate this result.


The infringing article was posted on September 27, 2007 at 5:00 AM, and
it can be found at:

http://boogie4.us/blogs/752/
http://boogie4.us/artist/Office/2


The copyrighted work at issue is posted here:

http://www.musicbox-online.com/reviews-2007/office-nightattheritz-0920200702.html


Please Note: Boogie4.us appears to be an aggregator of some sort.
Blogspot staff has removed the blog page that served as its source (from
JonkMusic), but the aggregator still shows content from our site with a
link to JonkMusic.


The posting of these materials infringes upon the copyrights of me and
my company The Music Box. I may be contacted at the email address and
phone number listed below.

Boogie4.us can be reached at:

Administrative Contact Name: [private]
Administrative Contact Organization: none
Administrative Contact Address1: [private]
Administrative Contact City: Ichikawa-shi
Administrative Contact State/Province: Chiba-ken
Administrative Contact Postal Code: [private]
Administrative Contact Country: Japan
Administrative Contact Country Code: JP
Administrative Contact Phone Number: +[private]
Administrative Contact Email: [private]@gmail.com


I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized
by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,




[private]
Editor, The Music Box
[private]@musicbox-online.com
[private]
